name: rohlik-case-study
description: Spring Boot Case Study Application - Development Proxy

scripts.build: echo 'To build the Java project: sh ./mvnw clean package'
scripts.test: echo 'To test the Java project: sh ./mvnw test'
scripts.help: echo 'Development server running on http://localhost:3000' && echo 'This is a proxy for the Spring Boot application' && echo 'To run actual Java app: npm run java:dev'
